relevant_tweets.summary: 介绍 Gemini 系列产品的最新功能 —— 原生图像生成。支持生成交错文本与图片并能编辑上传图像，展示了该模型的多模态能力。

original_tweet.fullText:
Native image generation with Gemini is live 🚀🔥

You can generate interleaved text and images and edit uploaded images all in a unified model. Big congrats to @robertriachi @19kaushiks @mentzer_f and many more amazing folks who built this!

Try it out and tell us what you think:… https://t.co/2zABsDrXSf

relevant_tweets.summary: 宣传 Google 在 #KHIPU2025 展位的演示活动，展示 ChaTS-PI —— 一款利用生成型 AI 模型自动生成图表总结，并通过批评模型修正总结内容的工具。

original_tweet.fullText: Stop by the #KHIPU2025 Google booth today at 15:30, where Julian Eisenschlos will demo ChaTS-PI, a generative AI model that takes a chart, generates a summary, and then uses a critic model to verify and revise the summaries for accuracy. https://t.co/rDE5kJlWM3

relevant_tweets.summary: 报道 Google 推出 Gemini Robotics，将 AI 技术引入实体机器人，使之具备实时感知、思考与行动能力，同时列出了该技术的 10 个突破性功能点。

original_tweet.fullText:
This is wild.

Google just unleashed Gemini Robotics, bringing AI into the physical world.

Robots can now see, think, and ACT in real-time.

10 mind-blowing things Gemini Robotics can do: https://t.co/Bj8nfND0FW

threadTexts.text:
1. Dexterity

Completes precise tasks, like origami folding handled entirely by AI-driven robots 🤯 https://t.co/v1Pq19kk0H

2. Interactivity

Understands commands in everyday language.

Quickly adapts if objects move or environment changes. https://t.co/uMkhfxugEg

3. Generality

Instantly handles new tasks and objects.

Performs tasks it's never seen before, doubling other models’ performance. https://t.co/e7tXJvan1q

4. World Understanding (Gemini Robotics-ER)

Understands objects’ shape and position instantly.

Plans safe, accurate movements to grasp and manipulate objects. https://t.co/2xQEDB1Sy4

5. Multiple Embodiments

Works across various robots, including humanoid models like Apollo.

Easily adapts to different robotic hardware. https://t.co/bq6jXweCMR

If you enjoyed this thread,

Follow me @minchoi and please Bookmark, Like, Comment & Repost the first Post below to share with your friends:
https://t.co/F0vLciAIOC
@imPenny2x We need Tesla Optimus powered by Grok!
@StacieATyler Glad you enjoyed it 🙏

results.overall_assessment: 这批推文涵盖了多个与 AI 相关的重要新闻主题，包括 AI 与机器人技术的深度融合、领先公司的新产品与 SDK 发布、以及在量子计算与多模态生成方面的前沿进展。多数推文发布者具有较高的话语权，信息价值较高，适合纳入日报供业界关注。

relevant_tweets.summary: Perplexity announces the availability of its API Model Context Protocol (MCP) along with an MCP server for Sonar, enabling AI assistants to perform real-time web research with improved accuracy.

original_tweet.fullText:
The Perplexity API Model Context Protocol (MCP) is now available.

We've built an MCP server for Sonar, giving AI assistants real-time, web search research capabilities.

Powered by Perplexity, Claude can now search the web and deliver real-time and accurate insights on demand. https://t.co/TxxkaD9CLt

relevant_tweets.summary: Google DeepMind unveils Gemini Robotics, the latest AI models designed to enhance physical world interactions through improved reasoning, interactivity, dexterity, and generalization.

original_tweet.fullText:
Meet Gemini Robotics: our latest AI models designed for a new generation of helpful robots. 🤖

Based on Gemini 2.0, they bring capabilities such as better reasoning, interactivity, dexterity and generalization into the physical world. 🧵 https://t.co/EXRJrmxGxl https://t.co/MeEkRLomXm

threadTexts.text:
Gemini Robotics can solve multi-step tasks that require significant dexterity, such as folding origami 📄 packing a lunch box 🥗 and more.

See it in action ↓ https://t.co/WgHfQz8n9N
⚙️ It goes head to head with our team to wrap a timing belt around gears - a feat that’s harder than you think ↓ https://t.co/Q9D5s7Md7d

Robots must be able to interact seamlessly with humans. 🤝

When it’s interrupted or situations change, Gemini Robotics can adjust its actions on the fly.

This level of steerability will empower us to better work with future robot assistants in the home, at work and beyond. https://t.co/3JuPAifFCX

They also accomplished tasks not seen in training, showing the ability to generalize to new scenarios. 💡

We show that on average, Gemini Robotics more than doubles performance on a comprehensive generalization benchmark - compared to other state-of-the-art… https://t.co/rqgRiM2hRs

Our model Gemini Robotics-ER allows roboticists to tap into the embodied reasoning of Gemini. 🌐

For example, if a robot came across a coffee mug, it could detect it, use ‘pointing’ to recognize parts it could interact with - like the handle - and recognize objects to avoid when… https://t.co/HQMXvWLoJ5

Our ultimate goal is to develop AI that could work for any robot - no matter its shape or size.

This includes bi-arm platforms like ALOHA 2 and Franka 🦾
but also for more complex embodiments such as the Apollo developed by @Apptronik. https://t.co/dPd5JtyWpo

We're partnering with @Apptronik to build the next generation of humanoid robots with Gemini 2.0 - and opening our Gemini Robotics-ER model to trusted testers such as Agile Robots, @AgilityRobotics, @BostonDynamics and @EnchantedTools.

Find out more → https://t.co/EXRJrmxGxl https://t.co/dtEV6DX0A8

relevant_tweets.summary: Google DeepMind outlines its ambition to develop versatile AI for robots of all shapes and sizes, mentioning partnerships and examples like ALOHA 2, Franka, and Apptronik’s Apollo.

original_tweet.fullText:
Our ultimate goal is to develop AI that could work for any robot - no matter its shape or size.

This includes bi-arm platforms like ALOHA 2 and Franka 🦾
but also for more complex embodiments such as the Apollo developed by @Apptronik. https://t.co/dPd5JtyWpo

relevant_tweets.summary: Google DeepMind and Apptronik partner to build next-generation humanoid robots, opening the Gemini Robotics-ER model to trusted testers including Agile Robots, Boston Dynamics, and others.

original_tweet.fullText:
We're partnering with @Apptronik to build the next generation of humanoid robots with Gemini 2.0 - and opening our Gemini Robotics-ER model to trusted testers such as Agile Robots, @AgilityRobotics, @BostonDynamics and @EnchantedTools.

Find out more → https://t.co/EXRJrmxGxl https://t.co/dtEV6DX0A8

relevant_tweets.summary: ManusAI shares that its product is experiencing high demand with 2 million people on the waitlist and indicates that they are working round the clock to expand access.

We’re so excited and humbled by the incredible demand, and we’re working around the clock to bring Manus to more of your as soon as possible.

relevant_tweets.summary: CAMEL-AI announces an event featuring Sumeet Motwani discussing MALT, a new multi-agent post-training method designed to improve reasoning and self-correction in AI.

He’ll dive into MALT: Improving Reasoning with Multi-Agent LLM Training, a new multi-agent post-training method that uses credit assigned synthetic data to improve the reasoning capabilities and self-correction… https://t.co/AUcSI2RSgC

results.overall_assessment: 这批推文涵盖了多个与AI相关的热点，从新产品发布、技术集成、AI机器人体能力提升到开发者工具和最新研究成果，整体上为日报提供了丰富而具新闻价值的信息。

relevant_tweets.summary: Ali通义Wan团队推出新开源视频生成和编辑模型 VACE，支持多条件生成视频及多种编辑方式。

original_tweet.fullText:
VACE：All-in-One视频生成和编辑模型
阿里通义Wan团队的新模型，即将开源。支持按条件生成视频，也支持多种方式编辑视频，包括控制运动轨迹、替换主体、主体参考、画面扩展等。
项目地址：https://t.co/jwOgTeXawE https://t.co/RSYIMIqh3L

relevant_tweets.summary: 谷歌突然开源 Gemma 3 模型，提供1B、4B、12B和27B四个尺寸，支持多种语言、多模态视觉推理、超长上下文等特性，并有官方量化版本。

original_tweet.fullText:
谷歌突然开源 Gemma 3 模型

LMArena 排行榜居然居然超过了 Llama 405B 和 03mini

- 1B、4B、12B 和 27B 四个尺寸
- 超过 35 种语言的开箱即用支持
- 支持多模态视觉推理能力
- 128K 的超长上下文长度
- 支持函数调用和结构化输出
- 提供官方量化版本 https://t.co/NdAkjnvipl

relevant_tweets.summary: Google DeepMind推出Gemma 3，被称为可以在单个GPU或TPU上高效运行的最强大AI，适用于从笔记本到高性能工作站的广泛设备。

original_tweet.fullText:
Google DeepMind just dropped Gemma 3 and it’s a big deal.

This is the most powerful AI you can run on a single GPU or TPU.

That means fast, efficient AI that works on everything from laptops to high-end workstations, no need for expensive cloud setups.

relevant_tweets.summary: Proception人形机器人初创公司展示其 humanoid 机器人手部早期原型，通过真实人类与环境互动数据构建灵活机器人。

original_tweet.fullText:
总部位于帕洛阿尔托的 Proception 人形机器人初创公司从隐身中现身。

他们展示了其人形机器人手部的早期版本——旨在通过真实人类与不同物体和环境互动的数据来构建灵活的机器人。
https://t.co/5E7lL2iAdt

results.overall_assessment: 这一批推文主要围绕AI领域的最新产品发布和开源模型（尤其是Gemma 3系列）的信息展开，同时也涵盖了诸如视频生成技术和机器人技术等领域的进展。整体上，这些信息均具有较高的新闻价值，适合加入日报。

relevant_tweets.summary: 报道最新AI新闻，包括OpenAI推出DIY工具，支持构建自定义自主AI代理，以及来自Meta、Reka、Cartesia、Harvey、Luma Labs和Manus的更多消息。

original_tweet.fullText:
TODAY'S AI NEWS: OpenAI just dropped DIY tools to build custom autonomous AI agents

Plus, more news from Meta, Reka, Cartesia, Harvey, Luma Labs, and Manus.

Here's everything you need to know:

relevant_tweets.summary: 讨论RAG技术的衰退及LLM大型上下文窗口的关键发展事件，列举了Anthropic Claude、Google Gemini 1.5和Model Context Protocol等重要里程碑。

original_tweet.fullText:
RAG 自从第一个大型上下文窗口 LLM 出现后就一直在衰退。

一些显著的“死亡”事件包括：

• 2023年5月：Anthropic 的 Claude，100k token 的上下文窗口

• 2024年2月：Google 的 Gemini 1.5，1M token 的上下文窗口

• 2025年3月：Model Context Protocol 让你直接与数据对话 https://t.co/u9aQBj02wl

threadTexts.text: https://t.co/OqjDgeHzxl

original_tweet.fullThreadText:
RAG 自从第一个大型上下文窗口 LLM 出现后就一直在衰退。

一些显著的“死亡”事件包括：

• 2023年5月：Anthropic 的 Claude，100k token 的上下文窗口

• 2024年2月：Google 的 Gemini 1.5，1M token 的上下文窗口

• 2025年3月：Model Context Protocol 让你直接与数据对话 https://t.co/u9aQBj02wl

https://t.co/OqjDgeHzxl

relevant_tweets.summary: 介绍Wan团队推出的All-in-One视频编辑框架VACE，展示其AI驱动的多种功能，如移动对象、替换对象、引用图像风格、扩展边界和动画等。

original_tweet.fullText:
Wan 团队的 All-in-One 视频编辑框架 VACE 太强了

可以混合任何内容到视频中：

Move-Anything: 在图像中移动选定对象到新位置
Swap-Anything: 替换图像中的一个对象为另一个对象
Reference-Anything: 参考图像的风格应用到目标图像
Expand-Anything: 扩展图像边界，智能填充新区域
Animate-Anything:… https://t.co/U9sB36GOuM

threadTexts.text: 项目页面：https://t.co/qiCD25Nxzn

relevant_tweets.summary: 宣布推出Talk To X应用程序，用户可以实时对话查询X平台的大数据库，获取各类信息和见解，覆盖多个领域的查询。

original_tweet.fullText:
Talk To X已推出 ！

你可以直接“聊天”与整个 X 数据库，获取实时见解和答案：

-谁是火箭领域的最佳细分影响者？
-当前 AI 领域的热门帖子有哪些？
-我的粉丝中谁能帮我介绍 Lex Fridman？
-谁是 X 上振动编码的关键声音？ https://t.co/pAMJN2COsI

threadTexts.text: https://t.co/PEw1wtlt4q

results.overall_assessment: 这批推文主要涵盖了AI领域的最新新闻、技术演进和产品更新消息，其中涵盖了自主AI代理工具、LLM上下文窗口的重要发展，以及新推出的AI应用产品。内容具有较高的新闻价值和行业指向性，可作为日报的信息来源。
